RPT Smoking kills the working poor; cigs were often their only affordable pleasure. I've been sad & angry over this since my childhood
No sympathy for working-class men with lung cancer, wrote a dying AA Gill in @thetimes this month. Nor those with COPD, I'd add.
@amy_may NZ couldn't be further from Orkney but your book spirits the islands here. A gutsy, saltysweet, breathtaking read. Wonderful you!
